Title: S&P Global Ratings Upgrades Teva to ‘BB+’ Amid Strong Execution of Pivot to Growth Strategy; Moody’s Ratings Agency Revises Outlook to Positive

Title: Reliance Resumes Russian Oil Imports To Feed Jamnagar Refinery
Source: Ndtvprofit.com

Description: India’s Reliance Industries Ltd. resumed purchases of discounted Russian crude, sourcing barrels from non-sanctioned suppliers and routing them to its refinery in Gujarat. India’s largest refiner contracted Aframax tankers from RusExport and is routing flows …

Title: S&P Global Ratings Upgrades Teva to ‘BB+’ Amid Strong Execution of Pivot to Growth Strategy; Moody's Ratings Agency Revises Outlook to Positive
Source: GlobeNewswire
Date: 24/12/2025, 7:06:00 pm
Description: TEL AVIV, Israel, Dec. 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd. (NYSE and TASE: TEVA) today announced that S&P Global Ratings ("S&P") has upgraded Teva’s long-term issuer credit rating to ‘BB+’ from ‘BB’, with a stable outlook, and tha…
